title: Screen freezing on lock screen
content: I have  had my phone for almost a year and it has worked perfectly up untill now.  I have restarted in safe mode, cleaned out storage and erased all additional apps from my phone with no results.  My Pixel 3 will go dark on screen then not respond after I click the home button/power/finger lock and will be frozen on the time and notification screen for around 5 minutes before alowing me to open it.  Please help me I am out of options.
